subject: Thank you for considering the plant-based catering petition

bodyConfig.opening_paragraph: I am writing to thank you for giving serious consideration to the petition on plant-based council catering. As one of your constituents, I appreciate that the council is examining this proposal through a formal report.
later_paragraphs: The petition received support from over 280 signatories who care about climate action and believe the council should align its practices with its environmental commitments.
I appreciate that for such a change to be successful, councillors and staff need to support it. I hope the report addresses potential concerns about menu variety, nutritional balance, and cost.
Other local authorities in the UK have successfully transitioned to plant-based catering for their council meetings and events. Their experience could provide useful guidance.
I hope you will support this proposal when the decision is made in March 2026.
